data.title: MARC 21 Format for Bibliographic Data: Table of Contents (Network Development and MARC Standards Office, Library of Congress)
data.meta_description: This page lists the table of contents for the MARC 21 Format for Bibliographic Data (Network Development and MARC Standards Office, Library of Congress)
data.text:
1999 Edition

Update No. 1 (October 2000) through Update No. 38 (June 2024)

This online publication provides access to both the full and concise versions of the MARC 21 Format for Bibliographic Data. The "full" bibliographic format contains detailed descriptions of every data element, along with examples, input conventions, and history sections. The "concise" bibliographic format contains abridged descriptions of every data element, along with examples. The full and concise versions are identified in the header of each field description.

Changes to the MARC 21 Format for Bibliographic Data that resulted from Update No. 38 (June 2024) are displayed in red print. The date located in the header of the full version of each field indicates the last month and year of update.

Table of Contents
